alert.note: Alert for Ellsworth; Lincoln (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 8:17PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Lincoln and northern Ellsworth Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 816 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Beverly, or 8 miles southeast of Lincoln, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ellsworth, Kanopolis, Lincoln, Sylvan Grove, Beverly, Barnard, Ash Grove, Westfall and Ellsworth Airport. This includes Interstate 70 between Mile Markers 208 and 235. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
